amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Interior to inform Congress about the steps taken to comply with the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to require that at the time the President submits a budget request for the Department of the Interior for the third fiscal year beginning after the date of enactment of the Act, the Secretary of the Interior shall notify the Congress about the steps taken to comply with the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (CO) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
